CustomField.formula:
IF( $Organization.Id =='00D7a000000568M' ,
HYPERLINK( 'https://'+ CASE( TEXT(Country__c) , 'UK', 'uk', 'US', 'us', 'CA', 'can', 'AU', 'aus', 'HK', 'hk','other' ) +'.givergy.com/manage/#login?redirect=events%2F' &CMS_ID__c& '%2Fedit&from=salesforce_community', 'Click Here' )
,
HYPERLINK( 'https://'+ CASE( TEXT(Country__c) , 'UK', 'uk', 'US', 'us', 'CA', 'can', 'AU', 'aus', 'HK', 'hk','other' ) +'.givergy.com/manage/#login?redirect=events%2F' &CMS_ID__c& '%2Fedit&from=salesforce_community', 'Click Here' )
)
CustomField.label: View in CMS
